tool.name: Fastq.info
tool.description: Convert fastq to fasta and quality

param.name: fasta
param.label: fasta - Add fasta to your history

param.name: qfile
param.label: qfile - Add qfile to your history

tool.help:
**Mothur Overview**
Mothur_, initiated by Dr. Patrick Schloss and his software development team in the Department of Microbiology and Immunology at The University of Michigan, provides bioinformatics for the microbial ecology community.
.. _Mothur: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Main_Page
**Command Documenation**
The fastq.info_ command reads a fastq file and creates a fasta and quality file.
.. _fastq.info: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Fastq.info
